content: it doesn t take much to create a trendy set of crochet earrings that you can wear casually or for a more dressy event stitched in aunt lydia s crochet thread classic 10 these lightweight earrings are made up of 3 multicolored crochet balls that are joined together learn single_crochet crochet in rounds single_crochet 2 together and more brimming with handmade charm you re sure to stand out in style materials aunt lydia s® crochet thread classic™ 10 white & natural 400 yds/365 76 m colors 300 yds/274 32 m contrast a ecru 0419 1 ball contrast b copper mist 0310 1 ball contrast c maize 0423 1 ball measurements approx ½ 1 25 cm diameter of each sphere approx 2 5 cm long excluding earring wire
